body:
A P.S. to Thomas' message -- we corresponded off-line and determined 
with the help of his sysadmin that he was originally running the old 
code when he got the avlmemi error, not the fixed version he thought as 
he thought.  I asked him to make sure that the new version was indeed 
working before he posted a retraction.


-Greg
___
